test.name: Usuário deve conseguir acessar a seção de depositar

kw.name: Open Application
kw.doc: Opens a new application to given Appium server. Capabilities of appium server, Android and iOS, Please check https://github.com/appium/appium/blob/master/docs/en/writing-running-appium/server-args.md | *Option* | *Man.* | *Description* | | remote_url | Yes | Appium server url | | alias | no | alias | | strict_ssl | No | allows you to send commands to an invalid certificate host like a self-signed one. |

kw.name: Quando acesso a página inicial do Aplicativo
Wait Until Page Contains Element
kw.doc: Waits until element specified with `locator` appears on current page.

kw.name: E acesso a seção de depositar
Então deve ser possível ver as informações sobre depósitos
Wait Until Page Contains Element
kw.msg: xpath criteria: //android.view.View[@content-desc="Como você quer depositar na sua conta do Nubank"] xpath criteria: //android.view.View[@content-desc="Como você quer depositar na sua conta do Nubank"]
kw.doc: Waits until element specified with `locator` appears on current page.

kw.name: Element Should Be Visible
kw.msg: xpath criteria: //android.view.View[@content-desc="Como você quer depositar na sua conta do Nubank"]
kw.doc: Verifies that element identified with locator is visible.

kw.name: Element Should Be Visible
kw.msg: xpath criteria: //android.view.View[@content-desc="Pix Sem custo e cai na hora, mesmo de madrugada e fim de semana."]
kw.doc: Verifies that element identified with locator is visible.

kw.name: Element Should Be Visible
kw.msg: xpath criteria: //android.view.View[@content-desc="Boleto Sem custo e pode levar 3 dias úteis para o dinheiro cair."]
kw.doc: Verifies that element identified with locator is visible.

kw.name: Element Should Be Visible
kw.msg: xpath criteria: //android.view.View[@content-desc="TED/DOC Pode ter custo e cai somente em horário comercial de dias úteis."]
kw.doc: Verifies that element identified with locator is visible.

kw.name: Element Should Be Visible
kw.msg: xpath criteria: //android.view.View[@content-desc="Trazer seu salário Receba todo mês direto aqui na sua conta, sem custo."]
kw.doc: Verifies that element identified with locator is visible.

kw.name: Run Keyword If Test Failed
kw.doc: Runs the given keyword with the given arguments, if the test failed.
